Why is it even being discussed here?! They're two different entities. Religion has nothing to do with Gay Right + Vice Versa.

Religion unfortunately has everything to do with gay rights. Historically the only reason homosexuality was ever outlawed was because it was against the Bible and God's will.
 
 Today most, if not all, of the anti-gay rights activists are also deeply religious. They may have other reasons as well, but still base a lot of their argument on that it is unnatural. What they mean is that it is against God, for after all there are enough other unnatural things nobody has a problem with. Even if they are not religious themselves they have usually been brought up by a strong religious family and had it repeatedly told to them that homosexuality is evil.
 
 And finally of course marriage is originally a religious ceremony, though it is less today.
Amusing as it is that the most common argument against it second to 'God says' is that it is unnatural. This coming from people who beleive a carpenter rose from the dead...
...and will come again, so be good for goodness sake...

...and will come again, so be good for goodness sake...

 I think it's fair to say that if there was no God, then there would be no gay people...
Actually, my religion has no problem with gay rights, it's the government that seems to have a problem with it because of the majority religion of Christianity.
What religion do you refer to?

Reform Judiasim...
 
 we include gays (both single and as a part of a couple and we perform same sex cerimonies).

Many scholors who study the bible believe that homosexuality was prevalent among the higher echelons of society in biblical times, but that it was mostly left out because it was not very acceptable to the lower classes. There are some instances in which some believe they hint at homosexuality though, such as Saul's son having a little crush on David, and so he helps him out and stuff.

Wow! There is no gay bashing in this thread...hmmmm...
 
 What's going on here?!

<Kronus bops Ladywolf on the head with a nerf bat<
 
 Happy now? emoticon_smile

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Religion + Gay Rights.
